battle_ticket.name: Battle Ticket
battle_ticket.description: Replenishes 1 battle stock. Consumed after use.

challenge_ticket.name: Challenge Ticket
challenge_ticket.description: Replenishes 1 challenge stock. Consumed after use.

battle_potion.name: Battle Potion
battle_potion.description: Increases chance of victory for the next battle/phase/turn. Scales depending on level difference from +1 for Grumbos who are 20 levels higher than you to +5 if the same level or lower. Can have multiple active at the same time but only 1 will be used up every battle. Against bosses, deal an extra 3 damage. Consumed after use.

antidote.name: Antidote
antidote.description: Removes the 'Poison' active. Consumed after use.

fools_gold.name: Fools Gold
fools_gold.description: Only 1 time, if you were to lose gold in battle (not challenge), the Fools Gold will be lost instead. Can only have one active at a time. Consumed after use.

grumbo_ticket.name: Grumbo Ticket
grumbo_ticket.description: Completely replenishes all battle and challenge stocks.

charm_of_wumbo.name: Charm of Wumbo
charm_of_wumbo.description: If you're battle chance is below 20% after all modifiers, bring victory chance up to 20%. Doesn't work against bosses. Consumed after use.

duel_converter.name: Duel Converter
duel_converter.description: Converts a battle stock into a challenge stock.

gamblers_coin.name: Gambler's Coin
gamblers_coin.description: Can only use 1 at a time. Gain 80 exp... or maybe lose 80 exp... or maybe...

flimsy_rope.name: Flimsy Rope
flimsy_rope.description: Has a 20% chance of avoiding any post battle Grumbo active effects (good or bad). Gets used up even if an effect wasn't avoided.

berserk_potion.name: Berserk Potion
berserk_potion.description: Increases victory chance by 5%. Every battle/phase/turn, the victory chance increased goes down by 1%, all the way down to -5% in the last battle. The same chance modifier is also applied to extra (or loss) damage done against bosses. Can only have 1 active at a time.

poison_charm.name: Poison Charm
poison_charm.description: Prevents poison. Poison that is already active will remain active. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.

bandages.name: Bandages
bandages.description: Removes the 'Bleed' active. Consumed after use.

master_grumbos_blessing.name: Master Grumbo's Blessing
master_grumbos_blessing.description: Use it to receive Master Grumbo's Blessing. It's random. But it's good.

feather_stone.name: Feather Stone
feather_stone.description: Removes the 'Petrify' active. Consumed after use.

grumbot_miner.name: Grumbot Miner
grumbot_miner.description: Grumbot mines for 10 battles/phases/turns, retrieving 90-150 gold after each one.

throwing_shield.name: Throwing Shield
throwing_shield.description: Throw a shield at an enemy in battle. Increases chance of victory by DEF/3. Against bosses, deals an extra 6 damage.

mini_magnet.name: Mini Magnet
mini_magnet.description: Gain 20 gold after every battle/phase/turn regardless of outcome. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.

blood_potion.name: Blood Potion
blood_potion.description: For 2 battles/phases/turns, increases chance of victory by 5-10%

iron_pendant.name: Iron Pendant
iron_pendant.description: Prevents petrify and bleed. Petrify or Bleed that is already active will remain active. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.

trip_mine.name: Trip Mine
trip_mine.description: Deals 10 damage. Doesn't do anything in regular battles, but it's duration will still be reduced. Consumed after use.

grumbo_whistle.name: Grumbo Whistle
grumbo_whistle.description: Pay 94 gold every activation to either reduce damage received by 5 or deal an extra 20 damage. Does nothing if you don't have enough gold. Still activates in regular battles. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.

class_ticket.name: Class Ticket
class_ticket.description: Allows you to class change immediately after using this ticket. Consumed after use.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description: If you have less than or equal to 10 HP at the beginning of the battle/phase/turn, recover 20 HP at the end of it. Item is consumed after use but the active doesn't get used up until it activates. Activates only once per battle.

stimulus.name: Stimulus
stimulus.description: If you have less than or equal to 20 HP at the beginning of the battle/phase/turn, deal 40 damage at the end of it. Damage is not reduced by phase loss. Item is consumed after use but the active doesn't get used up until it activates. Activates only once per battle.

boss_ticket.name: Boss Ticket
boss_ticket.description: Allows you to boss immediately after using this ticket. Consumed after use.
